title: Live Updates: Israel Strikes Targets in Syria, Casting Attacks as Defensive

title: South Korea’s Opposition Leader Determined to Oust President Yoon After Martial Law

title: Brazil’s President Lula Is in ICU After Emergency Brain Surgery
content: President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of Brazil was in the hospital recovering from the procedure. Doctors said the bleeding appeared to be linked to a fall in October.
summary: President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of Brazil was in the hospital recovering from the procedure. Doctors said the bleeding appeared to be linked to a fall in October.

title: Taiwan Says China Has Deployed Largest Fleet of Ships in Decades

title: France’s First Big #MeToo Case Goes to Trial

title: Israel Strikes Military Assets Across Syria to Keep Them From Rebels

title: On the Ground in Damascus as Syrians Chart a New Path
content: In a matter of days, Syria’s capital — once the stronghold of Bashar al-Assad’s government — became the epicenter of a new chapter in the country’s history after opposition forces overran the city. Christina Goldbaum, a New York Times correspondent, traveled to Damascus to find out how residents were reacting to the sudden breakthrough in the 13-year civil war as more than five decades of brutal rule by the Assad dynasty come to an end.
summary: In a matter of days, Syria’s capital — once the stronghold of Bashar al-Assad’s government — became the epicenter of a new chapter in the country’s history after opposition forces overran the city. Christina Goldbaum, a New York Times correspondent, traveled to Damascus to find out how residents were reacting to the sudden breakthrough in the 13-year civil war as more than five decades of brutal rule by the Assad dynasty come to an end.

title: Syrian Military Officials Charged With War Crimes as Government Falls
